# srotg

> Constructs a Given plane rotation for single-precision values `a` and `b`.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var srotg = require( '@stdlib/blas/base/srotg' );
```

#### srotg( A, B, C, S )

Constructs a Given plane rotation for single-precision values `a` and `b`.

The function has the following parameters:

-   **A**: rotational elimination parameter.
-   **B**: rotational elimination parameter.
-   **C**: cosine of angle of rotation.
-   **S**: sine of angle of rotation.

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="notes">

## Notes

-   `srotg()` corresponds to the [BLAS][blas] level 1 function [`srotg`][srotg].

</section>

<!-- /.notes -->
